function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decreased physical activity levels during COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased sedentary behavior can lead to a higher risk of obesity, cardiovascular diseases, and mental health issues.","Mitigation":"Promotion of at-home exercise, online fitness programs, and outdoor activities with social distancing measures.","Technologies":"Fitness apps, online workout platforms, virtual personal training, and wearable activity trackers.","People":"General population, especially those under quarantine or lockdown measures.","Owner":"Health authorities, fitness industry, and local communities."},{"Description":"Changes in physical activity behavior compared to pre-pandemic levels","Impact":"Shift in physical activity patterns can impact overall health, fitness levels, and metabolic health of individuals.","Mitigation":"Education on the importance of physical activity, provision of home workout routines, and establishment of community-based exercise programs.","Technologies":"Telemedicine for remote health consultations, virtual fitness classes, and online fitness communities.","People":"Individuals, families, and communities.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, fitness professionals, and community organizations."},{"Description":"Percentage increase in low active individuals during COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Higher number of low active individuals can lead to an increased risk of chronic diseases and diminished physical and mental well-being.","Mitigation":"Implementation of targeted physical activity campaigns, access to online fitness resources, and provision of affordable home workout equipment.","Technologies":"Social media platforms for fitness promotion, mobile health apps for tracking activity, and virtual reality fitness programs.","People":"Low active individuals, especially those unable to access fitness facilities.","Owner":"Public health agencies, fitness industry, and social support organizations."}]}
